Node.Text: Good morning! I'm headed to the lobby.
What are you up to today?
I've always got more work around this place. There's never a day off. Today, I'm gonna repaint some windows, then there's the funeral arrangements...
How is Mrs. Lindson handling the loss?
She's not taking it well, but I can't blame her. I don't miss that man, but I do feel just awful for her. There's nothing worse than seeing your own child cry.
Did you sleep at all last night?
No, I didn't. Like I keep saying, there's always something new comin' up around here.
No sir, I didn't, but I got something new to tell ya! There was a sickly sweet smell on some of the floors last night, and the smell ended right outside my door!
Now, I don't know what it means, but I'm hopin' nothing. I don't need someone's perfume staining the carpets!
Y'know, I'm glad you started working here, sir. It's hard to find trustworthy men these days, especially those as curious as yourself. Take care of yourself, y'hear?
